project_name: Solo Leveling System - Real Life RPG

design_philosophy.core_concept: You are the Player. The world is your dungeon.

scale.caption: text-xs md:text-sm font-mono text-slate-400 uppercase tracking-widest

layout.spacing: Generous (p-6 to p-12) for main containers, Tight (gap-2) for data lists

modes.hero: min-h-[80vh] flex items-center justify-center relative overflow-hidden

cards.style: bg-slate-950/80 backdrop-blur-md border border-blue-500/30 shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(59,130,246,0.1)] rounded-sm

buttons.primary: bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-500 text-white font-bold uppercase tracking-widest px-8 py-3 rounded-none border border-blue-400 shadow-[0_0_10px_rgba(59,130,246,0.5)]
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-slate-600 text-slate-300 hover:border-white hover:text-white uppercase tracking-widest px-6 py-2 rounded-none
buttons.danger: bg-red-900/50 border border-red-500 text-red-100 hover:bg-red-800 uppercase tracking-widest

inputs.style: bg-slate-900/50 border-slate-700 focus:border-blue-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-blue-500 rounded-none text-white placeholder:text-slate-600

modals.style: bg-slate-950 border-2 border-blue-500 shadow-[0_0_50px_rgba(59,130,246,0.2)] rounded-none p-0

visual_enhancers.borders: Tracing Beam effect on key cards
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Heavy blur (backdrop-blur-xl) with low opacity backgrounds

animations.glitch: Use on hover for interactive elements

backgrounds.description: Dark city night with blue glow - Landing Hero

fitness.description: Intense workout dark lighting - Training Mode

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. FORCE DARK MODE: Override the :root variables in index.css with the dark palette provided above. Do not support light mode.
2. FONT SETUP: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
3. SHADCN OVERRIDE: Customize components/ui to remove 'rounded-md' and replace with 'rounded-none' or 'rounded-sm'. The System is sharp, not soft.
4. BORDERS: Every card must have a border. Use 'border-blue-500/20' as default.
5. GLOW EFFECTS: Create a utility class '.text-glow' { text-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(59,130,246,0.7); }
6. LAYOUT: Use the 'Control Room Grid' for the dashboard. Dense data, high contrast.
7. IMAGES: Use the provided image URLs for backgrounds. Apply a dark blue overlay (bg-blue-950/80) on top of images to ensure text readability.
8. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, quest items).
universal_guidelines: Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures and noise overlays are recommended.
